CustomField.formula: IF( AND( NOT(OR(ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Incubate'))), OR(ISPICKVAL(Purchase_Type__c, 'First Purchase'), ISPICKVAL(Purchase_Type__c, 'Add-ON')), ISPICKVAL(Type, 'Revenue Opportunity'), CONTAINS('AE2, AE3, Enterprise', Owner_Segment__c) ), IF( $Organization.Id = '00DWF000009WNqj', $CustomMetadata.Order_Processing_Settings__mdt.Workato_Production.Webstore_Free_Trial_Endpoint__c, $CustomMetadata.Order_Processing_Settings__mdt.Workato_Sandbox.Webstore_Free_Trial_Endpoint__c) & '?id=' & Opportunity_UUID__c, '' )
CustomField.label: Webstore Trial Link
